RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $5,500 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $ 4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. 3 Year olds Claiming $6,000 (BC Bred $7500). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KAY'S KITCHEN settled off the contested early pace while racing just out from the rail entering the backstretch, rallied smartly three wide entering the final turn, and ran down a stubborn JUST MISTY while closing five wide in the drive to prove best. JUST MISTY dueled for the lead from the outside of AUNTIE J entering the first turn, forced the issue from the outside of that rival in the run down the backside, took command while racing two wide into the final turn, maintained her advantage into the lane, but was unable to fend off KAY'S KITCHEN late in a solid effort. VALERIE VALESKI away alertly and tracked the leaders into the backstretch while racing just out from the rail, rallied two wide entering the final turn, and finished three wide in the drive to garner a share. TEXAS HUMOR trailed the field into the backstretch while racing three out from the rail, rallied four wide entering the final turn, but failed to mount a serious late bid while finishing five wide in the drive. AUNTIE J away well and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from along the rail in the run down the backstretch, struggled to match strides with JUST MISTY entering the final turn, and faded over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Auntie J
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied rail, rallied inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Valerie Valeski
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Kay's Kitchen
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, rallied 3 wide, closed 5 wide, best

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied 4 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Just Misty
ENTRY.OWNER: Claggett Edwin MacPherson Craig and Armstrong Foster
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, led, held place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $5,500 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 15 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANAAMY broke sharply and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from along the rail in the run down the backside and into the final turn, opened a clear advantage leaving the turn and was never seriously threatened late. RACINO away alertly and stalked the leaders into the backstretch while saving ground at the rail, launched a three wide bid entering the final turn, and finished determinedly four wide in the drive to get up for the place in the closing strides. ANOTHERSUNNYDAY tracked the contested pace in the run down the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, dropped in to rally from just off the rail through the final turn, and finished two wide in the drive to just miss the place. WALKINTHEWALK unhurried early while trailing the field into the first turn while saving ground along the inside, rallied smartly two wide entering the final turn, but needed more late while finishing four out from the rail in the drive. BAKZONE away well and pressed the pace from the outside of ANAAMY entering the first turn, continued to force the issue two wide into the final turn, but faded over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Anaamy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led rail, rallied rail, closed inside, best

ENTRY.NAME: Bakzone
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, pressed 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Racino
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, stalked, inside, rallied 3 wide, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Walkinthewalk
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied 2 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Anothersunnyday
ENTRY.OWNER: Leffler Bob Killins Bryan and McCormick Gord
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 2 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 3 3 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000, For Each $2,500 To $45,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $62,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARTLEY MANOR away alertly and quickly sprinted to a clear advantage in the run to the turn, held a clear lead through the turn, and increased her margin in the drive while confidently handled. DREAMING D'ORO chased the leader into the turn while racing just out from the rail, and closed willingly two wide in the drive to hold the place. BECKETT'S BEST away well and chased the leader into the turn while racing one out from the rail, and closed three wide in the drive to just miss the place. STORMY RUNNER lacked the early speed to contend in the early stages while racing one out from the rail entering the turn, and closed with a rush four wide in the drive to just miss the place. RICK'S DANCER was devoid of early speed in the run to the turn, saved ground through the turn, and finished with late interest from along the rail in the drive while unable to make a serious late impact. I C KOFFEE broke sharply, but was devoid of early speed and trailed the field into the turn, and failed to make a late impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Rick's Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied inside, late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Dreaming d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2w, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: I C Koffee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Beckett's Best
ENTRY.OWNER: Tod Mountain Thoroughbreds and Redekop James
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, chased 3 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Hartley Manor
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, clear lead, widened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 4 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE OF $25,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 15 Allowe d 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, For Each $2,500 To $20,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $32,000. Races where entered for $20,000 or less not considered in Allowances.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAMRA broke sharply and was allowed to settle towards the back of the pack while saving ground at the rail entering the stretch the first time, rushed up four wide entering the backside and took a narrow lead into the final turn while racing one out from the rail, held a clear lead into the stretch, and was never seriously threatened late. REA MEA away well and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the stretch the first time, set a pressured pace from along the rail through the second turn and into the backstretch, was overtaken entering the final turn, but battled gamely through the final furlong to hold the place. PRETTY ARIA tracked the leaders into the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, maintained a tracking trip in the run down the backside and into the final turn, and finished three wide in the drive to just miss the place. WANDALITA away alertly and was allowed to settle towards the back of the pack while racing one out from the rail entering the stretch the first time, stayed within striking position in the run down the backstretch, rallied along the inside through the final turn, and finished two wide in the drive while unable to mount a serious late bid. BELCARRA PARK hopped at the start, but rushed up to force the issue two wide entering the first turn, continued to force the issue from the outside of REA MEA through the second turn and into the backstretch, jumped tractor tracks mid way down the backside and briefly lost her action, and was through thereafter.

ENTRY.NAME: Rea Mea
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied rail, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Shamra
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, settled inside, advance 1/2, rallied 2w, led, held

ENTRY.NAME: Wandalita
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, settled 2 wide, rallied inside, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Belcarra Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, dueled 2w, jump tracks 3/8, through

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Aria
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 12500. (PLUS UP TO $6,250 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 15 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $ 8,000, For Each $1,000 To $6,000 2 lbs. BC Bred Claiming $10,000, Three Year Old $12,000 (BC Bred $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMANDA stalked the early pace while racing two wide entering the backstretch, pulled her way into a tracking trip in the run to the final turn, rallied from along the inside entering the final turn, slipped through along the rail entering the lane, and was up in the closing strides to prevail. NINE OCLOCK CEASER away well and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace in the run down the backstretch and into the final turn, maintained the lead through the final turn, and just failed to last. TAM TRICKY away alertly and tracked the leader into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied smartly two wide through the final turn,and finished three wide in the drive while unable to match strides with the top pair late. VISENYA settled at the back of the pack while saving ground into the backstretch, commenced her bid three wide entering the final turn, and finished with late interest five wide in the drive. CARLA'S HONOR stalked the early pace while saving ground at the rail in the run down the backside, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, tipped four wide entering the lane, and finished three out from the rail in the drive. PENALTY TO RANGERS broke sharply and chased the leader three wide into the first turn, and held a tracking trip two out from the rail in the run down the backstretch. began to weaken approaching the final turn, and had nothing to offer late.

ENTRY.NAME: Carla's Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked rail, rallied inside, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Nine Oclock Ceaser
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, led rail, rallied inside, nipped

ENTRY.NAME: Visenya
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, rallied 3 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Tam Tricky
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked 2w, rallied 2w, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Amanda
ENTRY.OWNER: Anderson, Dr. Bryan C. and Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2 wide, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Penalty to Rangers
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 3 wide, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. (PLUS UP TO $8,000 THRIF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, For Each $2,500 To $20,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $32,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AN ARMY OF LIGHT away well and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from along the inside of MY MAN STAN in the run down the backside and into the final turn, turned back a threat by CROWN COUNCIL leaving the turn, and held sway while drifting three wide in the drive. CROWN COUNCIL tracked the dueling leaders into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied smartly from along the inside entering the final turn, shifted off the rail leaving the turn to tackle the pacesetter, was no match for that rival late, but finished willingly three out from the rail in the drive to prove clearly second best. CAIRO CRUSADER away alertly, but was allowed to settle at the back of the pack entering the first turn, began to advance soon after entering the backside, rallied three wide entering the final turn, and closed six wide in the drive to get up for a share. MY MAN STAN broke sharply and pressed the leader in the run down the backside while racing two wide, rallied one out from the rail entering the final turn, but was outfinished over the final furlong. KIKI'S SUNDANCER was squeezed soon after the start and settled well off the early pace while racing two wide entering the backside, was always well back and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: An Army of Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied rail, rallied inside, closed 3 wide, held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Nicky Drion Thoroughbreds, MachaBloodstock & Stephanie Poo

ENTRY.NAME: Kiki's Sundancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed start, settled 2 wide, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Cairo Crusader
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, trailed, rallied 3 wide, closed 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Crown Council
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied inside, closed 4 wide, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Stan
ENTRY.OWNER: Renfrew Racing B and B Racing Eugene Chan and Breen Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 7 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $6,000 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 15 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 15 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, For Each $625 To $5,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility and Allowances). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILK STILETTOS raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, controlled the pace from along the rail through the stretch the first time, held a clear advantage in the run down the backside and through the final turn, and was all out to fend off a late surge by IRISH LUNA to prevail. IRISH LUNA away alertly and tracked the leader into the stretch the first time while saving ground at the rail, maintained her position in the run down the backside, rallied from along the rail through the final turn, eased off the rail in deep stretch and closed with a rush to just miss. OSTRACIZE stalked the early pace while racing one out from the rail through the stretch the first time, maintained her position in the run down the backstretch, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, and closed willingly two wide in the drive to garner a share. ARTISTIC JEWLER unhurried early while dropping back to trail, began to advance four wide shortly after entering the backstretch, rallied four wide entering the final turn, and finished evenly three wide in the drive. ZETAMARIE broke sharply, but was allowed to settle well off the early pace while saving ground at the rail through the stretch the first time, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, but needed more when called upon. DON'TPASSTHEPEPPER settled off the early pace while racing one out from the rail through the stretch the first time, held a striking position in the run down the backstretch, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but lacked the needed closing response when called upon. HARLAN'S ANGEL away well and tracked the leader through the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, maintained her position in the run down the backside, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but faded over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Artistic Jewler
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied 4 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Zetamarie
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnson, Gary C., Pumpkin Stable and Sharlea Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, settled rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Harlan's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, tracked 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Ostracize
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2 wide, rallied inside, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Luna
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, track inside, rallied rail, closed 2 w, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Silk Stilettos
ENTRY.COMMENT: led rail, clear lead, rallied inside, held

ENTRY.NAME: Don'tpassthepepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, lacked response
